traits.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

traits.name: Steady as She Goes
entries: On the deck of a ship, Krux has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone} or shove it overboard.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giff makes two Longsword or Musket attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Musket
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Force Grenade
entries: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet, and the grenade explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6 damage) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After Krux throws the grenade, roll a {@dice d6}; on a roll of 4 or lower, Krux has no more grenades to throw.
